system.description:
You utter healing mantra of Agas, heal, spoken and sung during healing rituals. Healing Mantras heal The Vigor Soul first, before diving into the intricacies of an ailment. It is the Vigor that keeps us from death, that keeps The Immortal imprisoned within our bodies.

Spend 1 Beat to heal 2 an ally in range 5.

Kusgagas: +1 Beat to also cleanse all Fray from the chosen target.

Devagas: +1 Beat to Heal 4 all allies in burst 2.
